attributes.action: Tackle Anti Social Behaviour Through Early Education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our society has a major problem with increasing anti social behaviour.

We believe the real solution to the problem lies with early education and upbringing.

Children need proper guidance if they are to grow into good, respectful, responsible citizens of our society.

There is a children's book entitled: Sola's All New A To Z based around morals, principles, respect and responsibility which we feel offers that real solution.

We urge Prime Minister Gordon Brown to strongly consider introducing the book into Primary Education PSHE/Citizenship Curriculum.
